mapper.insert: insert into bcc_member (id, pw, name, email, tel, zip, address1, address2) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{zip}, #{address1}, #{address2})
mapper.select: select * from bcc_member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.delete: delete from bcc_member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.select: select tourist_spot.* from tourist_spot left join thumb on tourist_spot.num = thumb.b_num and tourist_spot.t_category = thumb.b_category where thumb.m_id=#{id } order by tourist_spot.num asc
select * from kakao_table where k_name=#{nickname} and k_email=#{email}
